Why Choose Us

Why Choose Japan Pride Journeys?

LGBTQ+ Native Guides

Our guides are part of the community or strong allies, ensuring a safe and welcoming environment.

Professional Photography

Capture your memories with our professional photography service included in select tours.

One-Stop Wedding

Celebrate your love with a traditional or modern ceremony, fully arranged by us.

Local Community Access

Exclusive access to local LGBTQ+ bars, events, and communities.
